EmailTemplate.name: External: Is there a problem with your photo upload photographs DE
EmailTemplate.subject: Safari365: Is there a problem uploading your photographs?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.FirstName},
we notice you have started uploading your photographs for your complimentary photobook, but the process has not been completed yet.
Please let us know if we can be of assistance or if you would prefer to use the services of Dropbox or Google Drive to send us these photograph?
Alternatively, complete the process at https://www.safari365.com/members/login/{!Opportunity.Members_Club_ID__c}
Kind regards,
Safari365 Photo Book Department
